projects.title: Apple Vision Pro Application
projects.description: Collaborated with ByteDance to develop and showcase an interactive AR/XR cooking assistant using their WebSpatial SDK. Built a dynamic, multimedia recipe workflow with modular pop-out timers for seamless multitasking, and deployed the production build via Vercel and the App Store.

projects.title: AWS Based Student Engagement Platform
projects.description: Built and deployed a scalable, serverless backend on AWS using Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB for a student engagement platform. Integrated AI features with AWS Bedrock and optimized database performance by reducing query complexity from O(n) to O(1) through a custom Python automation script.

projects.title: Fake Call Android Application
projects.description: Developed an Android app in Kotlin that simulates customizable fake calls, featuring CRUD operations for call logs, settings, and contacts with persistent storage. Designed a smooth, intuitive UI/UX and collaborated using Agile practices and Git for version control.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Responsive personal portfolio website with modern design and smooth animations. Built with React and TypeScript.

projects.title: NLP Sentiment Analyzer
projects.description: Natural language processing application that analyzes sentiment in text data. Uses transformer models for high accuracy.

projects.title: Task Management API
projects.description: RESTful API for task management with user roles, authentication, and real-time updates. Includes comprehensive documentation.

projects.title: Computer Vision Project
projects.description: Object detection system using YOLO architecture. Can detect and classify multiple objects in real-time video streams.

projects.title: Cloud Storage App
projects.description: File storage application with drag-and-drop interface. Features encryption, sharing capabilities, and version control.
